t: Ord. No. 2019-4. An Emergency Ordinance of the City Council of the City of San Mateo Temporarily Prohibiting the Commercial Operation of Electric Scooter Businesses.

c.x: That the above recitals are true and correct and are adopted as the City Co
For the immediate presentation of public peace, health, safety, and welfare
This ordinance is declared to be an emergency measure and interim ordinance
That this ordinance is adopted by at least a 4/5 vote of the City Council.
This ordinance shall of no further force or effect upon the 91st day after

c.t: Section 5. LEGISLATIVE HISTORY AND EFFECTIVE DATE.
